actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 95-74.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing consideration of waiving certain points of order against H.R. 4877, a bill making supplemental appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, l977.

summary.text: Waives all points of order against specified provisions in H.R. 4877 (Supplemental appropriations) for failure to comply with certain requirements of Rule XXI of the Rules of the House of Representatives, during the consideration of such bill.

titles.title: A resolution providing consideration of waiving certain points of order against H.R. 4877, a bill making supplemental appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, l977.
